text: Theresa Caputo (born c. 1965/1966 or 1966/1967)Caputo gives birth date as June 10, 1967: (sources do not agree) is an American actress. She is best known for portraying herself as someone who can talk to dead people on a television show. Many news organizations have called that claim fake. Caputo was born and raised in Hicksville, Long Island, New York ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Living people Category:Television personalities from New York (state) Category:Comedians from New York City Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Theresa Caputo
